com.suse.saltstack.netapi.event

Class EventStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.suse.saltstack.netapi.event.EventStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class EventStream
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Event stream implementation based on a ClientEndpoint WebSocket. It is used to connect the WebSocket to a ServerEndpoint and receive messages from it; for each message a bunch of EventListener will be recalled and notified with it.

    • Field Summary

      The WebSocket Session.

    • Field Detail

      • session

        public javax.websocket.Session session
        The WebSocket Session.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventStream

        public EventStream()
        A default constructor used to create this object empty. It prepare the WebSocket implementation, but it does not start the connection to the server and then the event processing too. This constructor is used for unit testing.

      • EventStream

        public EventStream(ClientConfig config)
        Constructor used to create this object. Automatically open a WebSocket and start event processing.
        Parameters:
        config - Contains the necessary details such as EndPoint URL and authentication token required to create the WebSocket.

    • Method Detail

      • processEvents

        public void processEvents(URI uri,
                          ClientConfig config)
                   throws javax.websocket.DeploymentException,
                          IOException
        This method initiates the WebSocket handshake and its life. This method is intended for use during unit testing only! End users should not call this methods directly.
        Parameters:
        uri - WebSocket URI
        Throws:
        javax.websocket.DeploymentException - If annotatedEndpoint instance is not valid.
        IOException - If WebSocket connection to remote server fails.

      • addEventListener

        public void addEventListener(EventListener listener)
        Implementation of addEventListener(EventListener)
        Parameters:
        listener - Reference to the class that implements EventListener.

      • removeEventListener

        public void removeEventListener(EventListener listener)
        Implementation of removeEventListener(EventListener).
        Parameters:
        listener - Reference to the class that implements EventListener.

      • getListenerCount

        public int getListenerCount()
        Helper method that returns the current number of subscribed listeners.
        Returns:
        The current number listeners.

      • isEventStreamClosed

        public boolean isEventStreamClosed()
        Helper method to check if the WebSocket Session exists and is open.
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the EventStream WebSocket Session state.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the WebSocket Session and notifies all subscribed listeners. that the event stream has been closed via EventListener.eventStreamClosed(). Upon exit from this method, all subscribed listeners will be removed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • onOpen

        public void onOpen(javax.websocket.Session session,
                   javax.websocket.EndpointConfig config)
            throws IOException
        On handshake completed, get the WebSocket Session and send a message to ServerEndpoint that WebSocket is ready. http://docs.saltstack.com/en/latest/ref/netapi/all/salt.netapi.rest_cherrypy.html#ws
        Parameters:
        session - The just started WebSocket Session.
        config - The EndpointConfig containing the handshake informations.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception thrown if something goes wrong sending message to the remote peer.

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(String message)
        Notify listeners on each event received on the WebSocket.
        Parameters:
        message - The message received on this WebSocket

      • onError

        public void onError(Throwable t)
        On error, close all objects of this class.
        Parameters:
        t - The Throwable object received on the current error.

      • onClose

        public void onClose(javax.websocket.Session session,
                    javax.websocket.CloseReason closeReason)
        On closing WebSocket, refresh the Session and close all objects of this class.
        Parameters:
        session - The WebSocket Session
        closeReason - A CloseReason for the closure of WebSocket.
